column1: 2227|ten twenty-seven p.m.|“Should you be having caffeine at”—Olive glanced at the clock—“ten twenty-seven p.m.?” Come to think of it
column2: he shouldn’t be having caffeine at all
column3: given his baseline shiny personality. And yet the two of them got coffee together every Wednesday. Olive was nothing but an enabler.
